channel.title: hat (blog)e-6
channel.description: 14 | your/ours | INSY | Triggers: dolls / Bridge on the River Kwai | SachikoP

item.title: My favorite genre of music is boys crying in song form.
I lost my precious arch foam eraser last month but it was safely stored under my sewing stool. Also they sell foam erasers at LARGE daisos (i.e. Federal Way, WA), so go buy some.
I hate it when you google [insert rock star's name here] and all you get is pictures of him at his current age. Show me the pics from 20 years ago wtf!!!
The best thing about running my own webrings is not being kicked out of them because I shit talked McDonald's french fries on the 2nd Tuesday of the month
VOLKS NEWS GET!!! (yesterday on a Sunday?!)
*3 lattes into the thanksgiving challenge* f*ck thanksgiving....
The hardest part about being female is the inability to stop thinking about chocolate at all times.
Absolutely a mystery why my Verona gallery is so empty.
I'm gonna buy a tow truck!!!
According to neocities view counter, I have hit 200k views! Thank you to the 5 humans who read my site and the 199,995 web crawlers who also "view" it!
*eyeing plastic fountain pens* i will break u...
Volks News GET!
After days of searching, I have located my larping glove IN THE SLEEVE OF MY DOTA JACKET
I am such an animal crossing villager right now. where did I leave that...
#notmylandlord
I am going to gaslight my landlords by swapping the side the door opens on the fridge when I move out
I am not ready to face Cheby's fangirls when they learn I wiped his faceup
who wants to karaoke lithium flower with me at sakuracon
my new music low: listening to skrillex songs in reverse
for the past week since changing my deodorant, I have been occasionally getting a whif of a foreign scent and freak out thinking someone is sneaking up behind me
how am i supposed to enjoy skrillex post 2011 if he quit singing
furuba was absolutely the worst BL i have ever read
I rediscovered my skrillex fanart folder I saved from /cm/ when I was 17 (I am still 17) and now I have gone full goblin mode.
What do you MEAN deadmau5 and deadpool are different people?!!
DO NOT tell Ryan I just bought a doll
My top 3 albums to listen to on repeat to piss off my friends, family, and neighbors:
I just went to 4chan dot org to look for pictures of cute boys and it turns out I'm a poser because I'm not old enough to like nu-metal.
Ryan is watching a show where they kill my favorite blue full body tights man constantly!!! How could they do this?!
Volks News GET! Also I decided to sign up for a GL membership so I could enter for RG Williams but they didn't take my card RIP!!!
If I told you how long I misread and mispronounced "Homestruck", you wouldn't believe me.
New way to decide on buying video games: Do I want to play this game or replay Persona 3 more?
Lots of dangerously good doll announcements tonight my dudes. Stay strong everynyan (except Mima)
Yeah, I ate your dog. Got a problem with that?? Take it up with my lawyer.
Praline has been freed from purgatory
Frat (fran hat) party
I was at the thrift store and saw a huge nerd out of the corner of my eye. I turned around and it was just a mirror.
I will not believe your doll isn't AI generated until I can hold it in my hands and smooch it.
FALSE! I did not refuse to show Mima Rio when asked. There is simply no truth in this statement.
Can you eat a dead dove? I want to eat a dead dove.
I have been banned from the local doll meetup after I kissed everyone's resin boyfriend.
I've taken so many photos in the past week I'm overwhelmed thinking of sorting through them.
It took 12 weeks 2 days but I can finally go back to the bar with my marimo friends.
I've drawn 6 Marilyn Mansons in the past 3 days I am absolutely unhinged
I've never heard this song uncensored before!! He wants to WHAT you like an animal?! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PTFwQP86BRs
every time i draw marilyn manson as a bishounen i become more aware of how unhinged i am
Can't stop thinking about chicken tatsuta

>be me
>find another papa roach album
>open the jewel case
>nothing inside
Help! I just tried to insert my SD card into a roll of floss!
I experienced an emotional rollercoaster today when I found Papa Roach - Infest and opened the case to find Britney Spears - Stronger
writing a script to post my tell-all expose on the touhou house after i kick the bucket. it wont surpass the ff7 house sorry.
thanks to eggnog i have finally bought a new m.2 ssd (and cleaned out casper) and wow this backup process is going way faster than expected!!!
the requirements for being a "good hamster" are ridiculously low
free gay porn: just search "male stock" on deviantart üò≤
I'm mad about Xenoblade AGAIN
INCUBUS - TALK SHOWS ON MUTE
I'm very thankful Captain Jack is not an actual generic military captain because the US would be screwed.

Sometime last week, I heard a song in my library I've heard many times before that said "electric" in one line and "sheep" in the next and I DID NOT write down what song it was. I'm now on a le epic journey to find it again. See you in 11 days....
Today we have AI generated art, tomorrow we will have AI generated BJD photos. When will this ridiculousness be banned?!
If you see me wishing for another tiny doll, take my f****ing debit card away from me. IM SERIOUS DO NOT LET ME BUY ANOTEHR TINY!!!!!!!!!!
Keep your friends close, keep your candy closer.
There's all these games and movies I want to watch and play but I just have so many better things to do. Maybe I'll make it through AA 1-5 before the end of the year!!!
Happy Easter and shout out to the dude who sculpted this Jesus statue that has lived rent free in my mind since 2009. (Ulmer M√ºnster)
Whoever decided on HYDE's foundation color for SEASON'S CALL screwed up bad. At least make his chest match!!
I'm still in disbelief every time I remember Simon and Garfunkel are counterculture.
Volks News GET! (yesterday)
Can you even call yourself a programmer if you don't know the order function data is stored in memory during execution?

description.p: I can't remember anymore ;_; Cheby will do it for me.

item.title: Please don't play april fool's jokes on me tomorrow!
You know that part where Momiji's mother rejects him because he turns into a bunny when he's hugged? I can't comprehend it. I would feel so blessed if that happened to me.
Nendoroids are just cute funko pops at this point.
good luck in your studies, Hina!
fine extra shoes (in box) vs damaged extra shoes

Game show host: Would you rather marry 7 resin boyfriends.... or Hina?
Me: *sweats*
I had to claim my Hina NFT on my taxes ;a;
Happy Hinamatsuri!
Ryan took out a restraining order against me because I made another joke about GameStop.
I'll only believe in AI when it creates the perfect version of Durch den Monsun in German with Bill's slightly deeper voice and drop in Monsoon. Until then, nonexistent.
I've only purchased Japanese BJD in the past 10 years #weeaboo
It's really rude to donate Cherished Teddies because I don't have room for all of them.
Congrats to Vega for the marriage of this happy couple!
How did all these 30 year old women get into high school? Every time I sneak in, I'm escorted out by the police. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aCyGvGEtOwc
I have never lived in an era where Ozzy Osbourne wasn't fried.
Why isn't there a switch holder to attach my switch to my face?
You'd have to be braindead to expect someone who calls himself "Jimmy Urine" to be an upstanding citizen.
Happy Ronnie day and happy birthday to Tommy february6!
If I kin with Ritsu from K-on, and you kin with Ritsu from Enstars, but you don't allow followers that kin with Ritsu, am I still allowed to follow?
I will never know if I actually got better at photography or if I just got a nice camera.
selling this wig is my biggest regret in life
"teddy bear parade" or "death row inmates" ;a;
#BringHimBack
Every time Cheby scowls at me I fall deeper and deeper in love with him
Science has yet to come up with an easily foldable fitted sheet. Can Science truly be trusted?
I'm going to cast Leonardo DiCaprio to depict me in my upcoming biopic.
Name one Japanese song that doesn't involve looking at the sky. That's right. You can't.
Can you trust the opinion of anyone who doesn't like sauerkraut? Their opinion is void.
YEEHAW
Ryan found my lens cap but now I lost my shitajiki!!!
The fan on my PS2 is SUPER LOUD how did we live like this??? #Just2000sThings
My tattoo apprenticeship is going very badly ever since I refused to get a tattoo.
I can't find my lens cap.
Hina learns CSS
Merry second Christmas to everynyan!!!
Very late thank you to @maullarmaullar for the Christmas card!!

I'm not obsessed enough with FF7 to turn 70!!!!! Not yet!!!!
andrew tate this andrew tate that WHO tf is andrew tate and why is no one talking about FRAN HAT
Next year's wish: I want to have lots of fun with Liam, Verona, Cheby, and Hina! I love them all so much! ü•π #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Regrets play: My biggest regret was not buying Cheby a body sooner! And also spending $16 more because I hesitated on a better deal earlier in the year. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Make Dolls Cute Again
Special of the Year: Jeez, Liam, you aren't supposed to look THAT good as a girl. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Portrait: The space portrait challenge was really fun and I can't believe I pulled it off #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Full body shot: I actually didn't take many full body shots of singular dolls this year #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
I finished my japanese baby making propaganda game last night and I have so many questions still #help
Kimono play: There's no way I misread this prompt #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Newcomer: I recieved 2 new dolls this year: Hina and Praline! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Ruined photo: Dude, seriously?! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
I will not be gaslit into believing "Elf on the Shelf" is a classic christmas tradition!
Outdoor photoshoot: I took Hina out twice to the cherry blossoms #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Favorite from 2022: It's probably not my BEST photo... #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Winter 2022: Winter starts today! It's too early for this prompt! Unless you meant last Winter?? #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
101 hours into Xenoblade 3, I have discovered you can press the L and R buttons to take a menuless screenshot
Autumn 2022: Cheby's falling leaves yukata fits the season perfectly! Except he's probably cold. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Summer 2022: Sundress n petunias #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
!voteban "christmas music"
ryan told me to stop playing with his coffee grinder
my doll was cheaper than this coffee grinder
wish i was at dolpa right now...
Spring 2022: Hanami hanami!! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Doll with prop: I built it myself! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
My doll's doll: I will never stop being tempted to buy a mature 1/6 doll for Hina!!! Until then... #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Twins: I was about to say I didn't take any photos of my bambicrony twins this year, but I almost forgot I have Kiki twins! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Alone in Heaven: Is this about my doll being Forever Alone or the fact I have no irl doll friends but many friends who are dolls? #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Fran Hat, inspired by Angus MacGyver
"Hooray!" Couple: I will only admit to owning one couple #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
December Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: Eh?! It's only halfway through the month! I made a latte that looks like a doggie. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Cheby is ready for his fountain pen club debut
November Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: I did another family portrait and it took hours despite only having half of my dolls in it! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞

October Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: I did research into Liam and got more confused than I originally was. Cheby got his yukata. Liam and Verona got a new shirt each, and Praline got her tiny overalls! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
"Every day is yesterday's big day tomorrow today" -Ryan
September Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: Liam had his birthday! Cheby's been here all along. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Japanese baby making propaganda game
If I ever find and go to a fountain pen meetup, I'm bringing Cheby with me.
gosh i hope someone translates the rest of these prompts past the monthly recap ones because i cannot read korean
August Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: Praline's arrival! I also made Hina a new sundress. After almost 2 years, I have hit 10k photos on my camera! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
What is this cute early birthday present from Ryan!! SO CUTE
July Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: More Liam x Hina photos. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞

June Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: I took photos of Liam x Hina on the computer Ryan bought at the thrift store. I successfully transfered my luck to hors for her win of Marmeladov! #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
May Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: Sochi's birthday and another trip back out to the cherry blossoms. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Every time I make anything even slightly resembling Mexican food: "Uh oh!! I hope this doesn't taste like Chipotle!!!"
April Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: I made a juban for Hina and took hanami photos! Hina's very expensive hands and feet arrived. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
March Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: Hina became heterochormatic this month. I had a lot of fun taking photos of Liam x Hina. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Volks news! This issue came with an extra mini poster #„Éú„Éº„ÇØ„Çπ„Éã„É•„Éº„Çπ
Neocities still has yet to discover HTML/CSS isn't coding.
February Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: Lots of sewing this month! I made Hina a pink blouse, a gingham furisode, and a dress form. #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
January Ïù∏ÎÜÄ activities: My most beloved little Hinachama arrived! I am so blessed to have her. üòò #2022_Ïù∏ÎçïÏù∏ÎÜÄ_Ïó∞ÎßêÏ†ïÏÇ∞
Pumpkin munching culprit: caught.
